name: Conway.js
tagline: A Javascript Conway's Game of Life
body:
### Conways Game of Life
This is another Javascript Conway's game of life. However, this implementation comes with a .rle decoder that can read all the community patterns. One can also change the decay and attack of how the game is drawn (doesn't effect rules). Try it for yourself:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Related Stuff
http://www.conwaylife.com/wiki/Main_Page
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway's_Game_of_Life

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Conway.js? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact samsface@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
